item.title: How do i make people mods and admins?
item.dc:creator: @_ownage1 ~ownage~
item.description:
@_ownage1 wrote:

[quote=“O M G, post:5, topic:83453”]Finally they changed the website back to normal!

Actually, it’s in the Ultimate Server Guide, as well as the character file method rarely works.[/quote]

thats also not needed

go to characters folder, click the name of the person’s notepad, and 1 for mod, 2 for admin and 3 for owner.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make people mods and admins?

item.title: How do i make people mods and admins?
item.dc:creator: @joecooper joecooper
item.description:
@joecooper wrote:

search for

//start of moderator/admin list

in client.java and then you’ll see something like this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

were it says admin put the name of the character you want to be a admin/mod/owner

and change the player rights to 1 2 or 3

1= p mod
2= admin
3= owner

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make people mods and admins?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Go into you’re source file. Be it Testscape, Pimpscape, whatever. Then go into the Character file, double-click the person you wan’t to make an administrator/moderator and change the player rights to one of the following :

1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Owner

Read full topic
